languages.text: "Но ты не бессмертен, мы оба это знаем". {n}Ирлиэт стискивает руки в кулак и одаривает гемункула испепеляющим взглядом.{/n} "Я убью тебя столько раз, сколько потребуется. Во имя моих павших собратьев. И во имя Крудараха".

"But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."
languages.original_text: "Но ты не бессмертен, мы оба это знаем". {n}Ирлиэт стискивает руки в кулак и одаривает гемункула испепеляющим взглядом.{/n} "Я убью тебя столько раз, сколько потребуется. Во имя моих павших собратьев. И во имя Крудараха".

traits.locale_text: "But you are not immortal and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kinspeople. And in Crudarach's name."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you are not immortal and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kinspeople. And in Crudarach's name."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you are not immortal and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kinspeople. And in Crudarach's name."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “但你并非永生不死，你我都很了解这点。”{n}伊莉耶特攥紧了拳头，瞪了血伶人，目光仿佛要把他烧成灰烬。{/n}“我会一次又一次地杀掉你，直到把你彻底杀死为止。以我逝去的同胞之名，以克鲁达拉赫之名。”
languages.original_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: “但你并非永生不死，你我都很了解这点。”{n}伊莉耶特攥紧了拳头，瞪了血伶人，目光仿佛要把他烧成灰烬。{/n}“我会一次又一次地杀掉你，直到把你彻底杀死为止。以我逝去的同胞之名，以克鲁达拉赫之名。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Doch Ihr seid nicht unsterblich, und das wissen wir beide." {n}Yrliet ballt die Fäuste und sieht den Haemonculus mit einem Blick an, der ihn einäschern könnte.{/n} "Ich werde Euch so oft töten, wie es nötig ist. Im Namen meiner gefallenen Verwandten. Und in Crudarachs Namen."
languages.original_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: "Doch Ihr seid nicht unsterblich, und das wissen wir beide." {n}Yrliet ballt die Fäuste und sieht den Haemonculus mit einem Blick an, der ihn einäschern könnte.{/n} "Ich werde Euch so oft töten, wie es nötig ist. Im Namen meiner gefallenen Verwandten. Und in Crudarachs Namen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Pero no eres inmortal, y ambos lo sabemos». {n}Yrliet cierra los puños con fuerza y fulmina al hemónculo con una mirada que podría incinerarlo.{/n} «Te voy a matar tantas veces como haga falta. En nombre de mis camaradas caídos. Y en nombre de Crudarach».
languages.original_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: «Pero no eres inmortal, y ambos lo sabemos». {n}Yrliet cierra los puños con fuerza y fulmina al hemónculo con una mirada que podría incinerarlo.{/n} «Te voy a matar tantas veces como haga falta. En nombre de mis camaradas caídos. Y en nombre de Crudarach».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet serre les poings et fusille l'hémoncule du regard.{/n} « Mais vous savez aussi bien que moi que vous n'êtes pas immortel. Je vous tuerai autant de fois qu'il le faudra, au nom de mes semblables et de Crudarach. »
languages.original_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet serre les poings et fusille l'hémoncule du regard.{/n} « Mais vous savez aussi bien que moi que vous n'êtes pas immortel. Je vous tuerai autant de fois qu'il le faudra, au nom de mes semblables et de Crudarach. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「でもお前がイモータルでないことは互いに分かっている」{n}ユリエットは拳を握りしめ、ハモンキュラスを燃やすような目で見る。{/n}「何度でも殺してやる。堕ちた同胞の名において。そしてクルダラの名において」
languages.original_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: 「でもお前がイモータルでないことは互いに分かっている」{n}ユリエットは拳を握りしめ、ハモンキュラスを燃やすような目で見る。{/n}「何度でも殺してやる。堕ちた同胞の名において。そしてクルダラの名において」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ölümsüz değilsin ama... İkimiz de biliyoruz." {n}Yumruklarını sıkan Yrliet, Haimonkulus'a yakıcı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kaç kere icap ederse o kadar öldüreceğim seni. Soydaşlarım adına... Crudarach adına!"
languages.original_text: "But you are not immortal, and we both know it." {n}Yrliet clenches her fists and gives the Haemonculus a look that could incinerate him.{/n} "I am going to kill you as many times as it takes. In the name of my fallen kin. And in the name of Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: "Ölümsüz değilsin ama... İkimiz de biliyoruz." {n}Yrliet, yumruklarını sıkmış; Haimonkulusa yakıcı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kaç kere icap ederse o kadar öldüreceğim seni. Soydaşlarım adına... Crudarach adına!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
